==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|enpfelhen}}, {{m|gmh|enphelhen}}, {{m|gmh|entfelhen}}, {{m|gmh|intfelhen}}, from {{inh|de|goh|intfelhan}}, {{m|goh|intfelahan}}, from {{prefix|goh|int|nocat=1}} + {{m|goh|felhan|t=to preserve; entrust; confide in; surrender}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ʔɛmˈpfeːlən/}} * {{audio|de|De-empfehlen.ogg|Audio}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-strong|class=4|empfiehlt|empfahl|empfohlen}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[recommend]]; to [[advocate]] # {{lb|de|reflexive}} to [[offer]] one's services ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-strong|empfehl|empfahl|empfohlen|h||empfiehl|empfähl|a|a}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Empfehlung}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
